name: Lepus
description:
Help the rabbit collect all carrots.

Your goal is to help the rabbit collect all the carrots in different levels by avoiding obstacles using the rabbit's greatest power - jumping.

The game only has 10 levels, so it's pretty short and takes about 5-10 minutes.

Controls:

Keyboard Jump/Select W or Space (hold to charge, release to jump) Right D Left A Mute Music M (only in the menu) Reset R (hold in game) Quit Q

Made by:

wypwawii (me) - everything
FangoRey - tester
Sloth - tester

Software used:

Aseprite - for art
Tilesetter - for tilesets
MapEditor - for levels
Bfxr - for sound effects

Publicly available resources are also used:

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/difference
Carrot pickup sound: https://freesound.org/people/MLaudio/sounds/511484/

Made with HaxeFlixel
